content:
Other symptoms that commonly accompany shortness of breath in individuals with a heart condition include:

1. Chest pain or pressure
2. Fatigue or weakness
3. Rapid or irregular heartbeat
4. Swelling in the legs, ankles, and feet
5. Dizziness or lightheadedness
6. Coughing or wheezing
7. Nausea or vomiting
8. Sweating
9. Shortness of breath during physical activity or when lying down
10. Blue or grayish skin color (in severe cases)
